text: Chalet Girl is a 2011 British-German-Austrian romance-comedy movie. It is about introducing people, romance and various family matters. Felicity Jones plays Kim Matthews. Brooke Shields plays Caroline. Sophia Bush plays Chloe. This movie got mixed reviews from the critics. It was released in the United States in October 2011. title: Chalet Girl
